summary: She is represented by Independent Artist Group and Untitled Entertainment. Meredith Wieck and Scott O’Brien are overseeing the project for the studio, for whom Robert Melnik negotiated deals. EXCLUSIVE: The Hunger Games: Sunrise on the Reaping has another new cast member in Emmy nominee Lili Taylor (Outer Range), who will play Mags, former Hunger Games champion-turned-District 12 mentor.
